overview: The short documentary film for Género 101 by Amazon Music is voiced by Sonoran artist Natanael Cano narrating the history of traditional Mexican music from its origins in the mid-19th century influenced by Europeans to the present, where it merges with elements of rap music from the South of the USA and Natanael himself is one of its main exponents.
tagline: The history behind Corridos Tumbados, told by Natanael Cano.
title: Género 101: Corridos Tumbados
